vistra.framework.graph.item.state

Class VertexStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • vistra.framework.graph.item.Item
        • vistra.framework.graph.item.Vertex
          • vistra.framework.graph.item.LayoutVertex
            • vistra.framework.graph.item.state.VertexStateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IItem, ILayoutItem, ILayoutVertex, IVertex, IItemStateHandler, IVertexStateHandler

    public class VertexStateHandler
extends LayoutVertex
implements IVertexStateHandler
    A vertex state handler.

    As being an item state handler, this handler has a stack as cellar at its disposal. It is therefore able to hold the state history and to set a previous state.

    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
    See Also:
    IItemStateHandler, EdgeStateHandler
